ShiftSegment.name: ShiftSegment
ShiftSegment.description: Represents a scheduled activity within a shift.

EndTime.description: The date and time when the shift segment ends.

IsInAdherence.description: Indicates whether the agent is in adherence (true) or not (false) for the scheduled segment activity.

Name.description: The name of the shift segment.

SegmentTypeId.description: The unique ID of the associated shift segment type.

ShiftId.description: The unique ID of the shift in which the segment is scheduled.

StartTime.description: The date and time when the shift segment starts.
